authors: Thomas J. Hamilton Special To The New York Times.
description: US asks Council session on Western resolution; Gross voices US view that debate need not await Peiping reprs arrival; backed by Min Younger (GB); speculation on action in event of USSR veto
title: U.S. BIDS U.N. CALL COUNCIL THIS WEEK; MARINES BATTLING COLD AND MUD IN NORTH KOREA
